sentences.en: A pain in his head made the walls waver before his gaze.
sentences.cn: 脑子里的疼痛使这些墙壁在他的眼前不住晃动.

sentences.en: As a result, their distribution features waver between common noun and localizer.
sentences.cn: 它的分布特征游移于一般名词与方位词之间,兼具二者的一些特性,这是虚化的结果.

sentences.en: He knows his responsibilities, and sorts of false ideas about responsibility can make him waver.
sentences.cn: 他知道自己的责任之所在, 因而关于责任的种种虚假观念都不能使他动摇了.

sentences.en: Her steady gaze did not waver.
In its inconvenient brightness Rosedale seemed to waver a moment.
sentences.cn: 在这束耀眼的光焰里,罗西德似乎摇摆了一下身体.

sentences.en: My faith will not waver because of him.
sentences.cn: 我的信心不会因为他而动摇.

sentences.en: No trouble can waver my heart.
sentences.cn: 艰难险阻动摇不了我坚定的决心.

sentences.en: Nothing could make me waver in my faith.
sentences.cn: 任何事都动摇不了我的信仰.

sentences.en: Shareholders who were wavering met the directors.
sentences.cn: 举棋不定的股东们会见了董事。

sentences.en: She's not waver to expressed any doubts about her choice.
sentences.cn: 她不能动摇,以表示任何怀疑她的选择.

sentences.en: The candle flame wavered, throwing shadows on the wall.
sentences.cn: 烛光摇曳，在墙上投下影子。

sentences.en: The disaster caused him to waver in his faith.
sentences.cn: 这件灾难使他对信仰发生了动摇.

sentences.en: The students’ attention did not waver.
This caused them to waver in their faith.
sentences.cn: 这件事使他们的信仰动摇了.

sentences.en: This last consideration made him waver.
sentences.cn: 想到最后这一点,使他有点动摇了.

sentences.en: Today on the streets of Montreal, opinion seems still to waver.
sentences.cn: 今日在蒙特利尔的街头巷尾，人们的意见仍摇摆不定。

sentences.en: We will never waver in this position.
sentences.cn: 这个立场是不会动摇的.
